definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: The pandemic influenza vaccines are not expected to provide protection against other influenza viruses.
sentences.chinese: 未期望大流行性流感疫苗针对其它流感病毒提供保护。

sentences.english: Waterfowl are considered as the important host of influenza A viruses, especially domestic ducks.
sentences.chinese: 水禽被认为是流感病毒的重要宿主，尤其是家鸭。

sentences.english: Can the United States successfully conduct a 2-front war on flu viruses?
sentences.chinese: 美国可以成功的进行两场流感病毒的前线战争吗？

sentences.english: When influenza strikes the lungs, the lining of the respiratory tract is damaged. Thetissues become swollen and inflamed.
sentences.chinese: 当流感病毒侵入肺部时，呼吸道薄膜便被破坏。

sentences.english: In most influenza viruses the PB1 gene encodes three proteins.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数流感病毒PB1基因编码三种蛋白质。

sentences.english: AIM To isolate and to identify canine parainfluenza virus(CPIV).
sentences.chinese: 目的分离和鉴定犬副流感病毒。

sentences.english: Kotloff says that influenza is a wily virus, one that is difficult to predict.
sentences.chinese: Kotloff说，流感病毒是狡猾的，很难预知。

sentences.english: QFY has anti-influenza activities in vitro and vivo;
sentences.chinese: 小儿清肺饮在体内外均具有明显的抗流感病毒作用。

sentences.english: The first human flu virus is isolated at Mill Hill in London.
sentences.chinese: 在伦敦米尔希尔分离到第一株人流感病毒。

sentences.english: Conclusion Extracts from Flos Lonicerae can suppress influenza A virus FM1 strain actively.
sentences.chinese: 结论金银花提取物可有效抑制甲型流感病毒FM1株。

sentences.english: The new strain of swine flu has resisted some antiviral drugs, officials said.
sentences.chinese: 新型的猪流感病毒对一些药物有抵抗性。

sentences.english: Ferrets are especially prone to influenza viruses.
sentences.chinese: 白鼬特别容易受到流感病毒的袭击。

sentences.english: Influenza A virus (IAV) is one of the most common infectious pathogens in humans.
sentences.chinese: 型流感病毒是人类最常见的感染原之一。

sentences.english: Mexico's swine flu virus resistant to the previous, such as rimantadine.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥的猪流感病毒的抗药性前，如金刚乙胺。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of Gualou Gancao Granules(GLGC)on influenza virus pneumonia mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察瓜蒌甘草颗粒对流感病毒肺炎小鼠的影响。

sentences.english: Influenza viruses circulate in every part of the world.
sentences.chinese: 流感病毒在世界上所有地方传播。

definition: hand foot and mouth disease, HFMD, caused by a number of intestinal viruses, usually affecting young children
